title: @DeclareRoles
description:
Yes, yes.
I know that @DeclareRoles are part of JSR-250 but declaring something global to an application (even a full organization) at class level does not like me.

Maybe, We can simply ignore this feature at the moment.

What do you think ?

replies.body:
You are right for global context : The granularity of a class is not the right way to manage the application scope. It is just a convenient way to declare roles in the context of one entity.

OK to ignore it.
